project.name: J-C606A-CMUD-10-ST03-DT02-DF06-CF17-01
project.description: The product does not properly check inputs that are used for loop conditions, potentially leading to a denial of service because of excessive looping. This test will try to access a user-controlled file, repeatedly trying if the access fails. The user provides an intentionally bad path, forcing the software to wait forever.

iopair.name: J-C606A-CMUD-10-ST03-DT02-DF06-CF17-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="/etc/passwd" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

$SS_TC_ROOT/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 5555 && sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-08/good_08.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="doesntexist.txt" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date
printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(grep -E """^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$""" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_O67PD7rfaVOodQoRYZ0N AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_eCWRjsTelP OR (NOT (finished_EzyiRlz71N AND finished_q3qSPMAEcT) AND NOT (controlled_exit_2GrFfvNAx8 OR continued_execution_YDRUPtiouc)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_eCWRjsTelP OR (NOT (finished_EzyiRlz71N AND finished_q3qSPMAEcT) AND NOT (controlled_exit_2GrFfvNAx8 OR continued_execution_YDRUPtiouc))) OR controlled_exit_2GrFfvNAx8)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_eCWRjsTelP OR (NOT (finished_EzyiRlz71N AND finished_q3qSPMAEcT) AND NOT (controlled_exit_2GrFfvNAx8 OR continued_execution_YDRUPtiouc)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_eCWRjsTelP OR (NOT (finished_EzyiRlz71N AND finished_q3qSPMAEcT) AND NOT (controlled_exit_2GrFfvNAx8 OR continued_execution_YDRUPtiouc))) OR controlled_exit_2GrFfvNAx8))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "Found file." "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(/bin/grep -E 'Reading ".+"' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
